title: [1.15.2-1.14.4][Enemyz——敌意显示]一个简单的视觉增强模组
author: Qunit
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qunit 于 2020-9-19 12:35 编辑 

模组介绍以下内容取自MC百科（没错我很诚实XD，因为没啥介绍的）
Enemyz是一个小型Mod，它为Minecraft增添了一个新的功能。 
安装它后，初入游戏，你可能不会发现任何不一样的地方。
但当你发现一个想要攻击你的生物时，它的头上会出现一个红色的头颅图标。





1584702133_40805_QrlS_副本.jpg (56.42 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-8-5 13:42 上传





Enemyz的这个功能可以帮助你避免敌人。假如你在下界，周围都是僵尸猪人，你不小心打到它们，
当你逃过了一个又一个想要攻击你的猪人时，你可以通过红色的头颅图标观察哪个猪人试图攻击你，
这有助于躲避它们，直到它们恢复正常。官网原文Enemyz is a small mod that gives your minecraft game a new feature. when installed, 
it is highly likely that you will not notice anything unusual. but when you encounter a creature that wants to attack you,
you will see that they have a red skull icon on top see the screenshots.
This feature of mods can become quite useful in helping you avoid enemies. 
suppose you are in the nether and around you is zombie pigman. you missed hitting them one by one and now the zombie pigman group chases you. you will clearly see which zombie pigman is trying to attack you with the appearance of a red skull on their heads. 
this will help you avoid them and wait until they return to normal.下载地址尚未获得授权，请支持原作者，到官网下载
[curseforge]此模组需要前置：lolipop[curseforge]
诶这里有一个整合包也加入了这个模组哦XD[groupid=1536]Firefly Studio[/groupid]
